actionTemplate.title: Tang Butterfly Lip A (Softer Peaks)
steps: Neutralize the lip color and add a thin balm base
Outline a butterfly-shaped cupid's bow with softer peaks
Widen the center of the lower lip for symmetrical fullness
Fill, refine edges, and deepen the center if desired

rationaleTemplate: A defined cupid's bow reads classic and ornate.
Great for photos or stage looks with strong shape.
